name: @tonk/host-web
description: Host shell to bootstrap a tonk on the web

scripts.dev: npm run build:sw && npm run copy-sw-for-dev && serve src
scripts.dev:with-proxy: npm run build:sw && npm run copy-sw-for-dev && PORT=4000 NODE_ENV=development vite dev --port=4000
scripts.start: npm run build:sw && npm run copy-sw-for-dev && PORT=4000 NODE_ENV=production vite --port=4000 --host
scripts.build:sw: vite build --config vite.sw.config.ts && mkdir -p dist && cp -r dist-sw/* dist/
